txt.en: Knock out the Orc jailor
'Oooo, big strong [placeholder]. Your strength will feed the pack now! Haha, dumb [placeholder]. I bet you not so tough.'
The time has come to enter the dwarf ruin, Shathur-munzu. The woodmen warned us of 'monsters' and 'The Shadow Hunter', but I remain unconvinced. Whatever lies inside, we are capable of defeating it.
'No! Aaaah!'
You wake up in a cage inside what must be Shathur-munzu
'Come, let's move.'
Defeat the attacker
You should be able to reach the key and free yourself from this cage.
The Orc jailor crumples to the ground. The key to your cage is in reach!
'Warg! Are you the one known as the Shadow Hunter? I have been charged with clearing this ruin of evil, in the name of Lady Arwen! Leave now, or you will be dispatched!
'Something is approaching, I can hear it in the brush. Soft paws, and a low growl.... It is moving quickly towards us! Look out!'
Baradal is standing by outside Shathur-munzu.\n\nYou should talk to Baradal.
Wake up
You find yourself inside a cage in Shathur-munzu.\n\nYou should wake up.
Knock out the Orc Jailor
'After some time, you awaken'
An Orc has approached your cage, taunting you.\n\nYou should knock out the Orc.
'You enter my territory and threaten me, little Elf? I am RÃ¡nulur, Chieftain of Wargs! You will be food for my pack!'
'You will fall by my blade, fiend!'
Talk to Baradal
'You dare taunt me? Really dumb [placeholder]. You going to get it now!'
The orc crumples to the ground. The key to your cage is in reach!
Instance: The Shadow Hunter
